description: This dataset contains statewide counts for every diagnosis, procedure, and external cause of injury/morbidity code reported on the hospital emergency department data.  Diagnosis codes are reported using ICD-9-CM or ICD-10-CM.  Procedure codes are reported using CPT-4.  External cause of injury/morbidity codes are reported using ICD-9-CM or ICD-10-CM.  ICD-10 replaced ICD-9, effective October 1, 2015.
keywords: Office of Statewide Health Planning and Development
name: hospital-emergency-department-diagnosis-procedure-and-external-cause-codes

resources.description: This data table contains statewide counts for every diagnosis code (ICD-9-CM or ICD-10-CM) reported on the hospital emergency department data. A principal and up to 24 secondary diagnosis codes may be reported on each emergency department record. ICD-10 replaced ICD-9, effective October 1, 2015. Note: Patients treated in the Emergency Department and then admitted to the hospital (ED Admits) are included in the hospital inpatient data only, not here.
resources.name: 2018-hospital-emergency-department-diagnosis-code-frequency

resources.description: This data table contains statewide counts for every procedure code (CPT-4) reported on the hospital emergency department data. A principal and up to 20 secondary procedure codes may be reported on each emergency department record. Note: Patients treated in the Emergency Department and then admitted to the hospital (ED Admits) are included in the hospital inpatient data only, not here.
